column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Came here with a large group on Sunday night (made reservations on OpenTable beforehand)
column2: and I'm glad we made a reservation because this place was poppin. We decided to all get tapas and paella to share
column3: which allowed us to try many different things. I would recommend getting a pitcher of their sangria (we got the classic red
column4: but all of them looked great!).
